alert.note: Alert for City and Borough of Yakutat (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 22 at 10:33AM AKST until January 22 at 9:00PM AKST by NWS Juneau
info.description: ...SNOW CONTINUES ACROSS THE CENTRAL AND NORTHERN PANHANDLE... .Snowfall continues across the panhandle with some pockets of freezing rain along the transition zone between Wrangell and Kake and up to Yakutat. Over the inner channels near Juneau, snow has started to become wetter. ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 PM AKST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Freezing rain and snow. Snow accumulations of around 4 inches. Ice accumulations of around one tenth of an inch. * WHERE...City and Borough of Yakutat. * WHEN...Until 9 PM AKST this evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...A transition back to snow is likely during the day followed by a change to rain or mix of rain and snow late tonight.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. People are urged to prepare their property before the onset of winter weather. For the latest road conditions, where available, call 5 1 1 or visit 511.alaska.gov.
